column4: Traffic;Sihanoukville:  Military police report that Preah Sihanouk province’s gendarmerie  arrested one Indonesian and another military officer driving a car with  RCAF plates at noon on June 14
column5: 2019.------1) Boeung Sophy ID number: 232831 “Lieutenant General”------ 2 / KUANIA WAN WIJAYA
column6: a 34-year-old Indonesian male living in Sihanoukville
column7: who used the car to bring Chinese passengers from Preah Sihanouk International Airport Sihanouk to the city.------An Escalade 2004
column8: was seized by the court.------The Indonesian was made to sign an education contrac and the military officer is facing disciplinary action. The car was to confiscated and kept in the provincial police headquarters.
